title: Fulfilling Your Destiny with Ease: A divine map to satisfaction in life
description: Fulfilling Your Destiny with Ease provides step-by-step spiritual guidance for those who want to find their purpose in life through God's will. Harrison Sabastine graduated from the Word of Faith Bible Institute in Lagos, Nigeria, and currently serves as a missionary in South Korea where he devotes his life to enlightening others, helping them discover their calling and untapped potential. For those who may be confused in life and do not know how to pursue a positive and fruitful direction, Sabastine shares practical advice on how to achieve championship living and a divine purpose for our existence. Others will learn how
author: Harrison I. Enudi
